inputs.name: jsonFile
inputs.label: Json File (full path)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location to load the JSON file from.

inputs.name: shouldPrefixVariables
inputs.label: Should Add prefix to variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows you to control if the task adds a prefix to the start of the variable names.  When using multiple tasks in the same build/release this will help keep things clear as to which file the variable originated.

inputs.name: variablePrefix
inputs.label: Variable Name Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: A Name to prefix the variables output by this task.  Set this to different values if you are using this task multiple times to keep things clear.
